channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023120854
item.description:
Report X-2023120854

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This was a wet package unloaded from door 17. The container inside had a loose cap. The package was placed in a hazmat bin and put in the hazmat cage until it could be processed after the sort. DescribePack: The container inside had a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a hazmat bin and put in the hazmat cage until it could be processed after the sort.

item.title: Report X-2023120758
item.description:
Report X-2023120758

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: KALAMAZOO
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UPON OPENING THE TRAILER, PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING. RESPONDER CALLED IMMEDIATELY. NO OTHER PACKAGES LEAKED UPON. PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO DMP WHERE RESPONDER DETERMINED THAT 1/6 CARTRIDGES HAD LEAKED AND BEGAN PROCESSING THROUGH THE DMP

item.title: Report X-2023120899
item.description:
Report X-2023120899

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-15
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was being loaded on the truck when they noticed it was wet along the top and side. QA was notified and brought the package to the hazmat processing cage. DescribePack: 3 out of the 4 bottles inside had loose caps which caused the cleaner to leak out onto the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was placed inside a hazmat tote and brought to the hazmat processing cage.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded in the unload and was discovered. Was placed in a leaker tote and brought over to internationals. DescribePack: Package had loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a leaker tote.
